Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Authorizes a pharmacist to substitute a brand name prescription drug for the generic equivalent of such drug if requested to do so by the patient
Summary: Authorizes a pharmacist to substitute a brand name prescription drug for the generic equivalent of such drug if requested to do so by the patient and record the request.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the substitution of brand name prescription drugs by a pharmacist
